org.apache.hama.bsp

Class TaskInProgress

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.bsp.TaskInProgress

  • public class TaskInProgress
extends Object
    TaskInProgress maintains all the info needed for a Task in the lifetime of its owning Job.

        jobFile - the path of job file
        partition - which partition this TaskInProgress owns.
